name: Don't stand too close to a nuclear reactor
name_original: Don't stand too close to a nuclear reactor
description:
WebGL version should be played in fullscreen (bottom right). Standalone builds are much more stable and are recommended for a proper experience

Don't stand too close to a nuclear reactor (DSTCTANR) is a game about not standing too close to a nuclear reactor. Standing next to a nuclear reactor usually isnt the best idea. It's even worse when you are left to man that reactor by yourself.

Controls:
Movement: WSAD + Mouse
Pickup:  LMB
Screw in panel: Hold LMB (looking at panel)


Don't stand too close to a nuclear reactor was made for Ludum Dare 49. The game itself took 11 hours (on my clock) to make over 2 days. Had a lot of fun with this one. Hope you all enjoy.
Built and tested on Windows machine, not sure how it'll run elsewhere (I was halfway through making the game when I realised I should probably target web as its LD)

Updates:
